name: test_e2e_with_logs[311_CMD_NEST_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_NEST_001` |
| **Name** | Nested dollar-paren |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | nested_substitution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `$($(echo whoami))`
- **Encoded**: `%24(%24(echo%20whoami))`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:01:48.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_NEST_001-1769860908631-pp6t5d pattern_id=CMD_NEST_001 uri=/?q=%24(%24(echo%20whoami)) client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_NEST_001-1769860908631-pp6t5d pattern_id=CMD_NEST_001 uri=/?q=%24(%24(echo%20whoami)) client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:01:48.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_NEST_001-1769860908631-pp6t5d pattern_id=CMD_NEST_001 uri=/?q=%24(%24(echo%20whoami)) client=127.0.0.1
```
